Amazonian region just east of the andes.

value: — The capital of Beni, also called the "Jewel of the Amazon". It is a very eye-catching town that is slowly but steadily becoming a city.
— An interesting town with a serious frontier-like feeling, set in the northern Bolivian jungle.

Flights or buses from La Paz and more.

value: Plaza Mariscal José Ballivián in Trinidad
— Tasty piece of cooked meat.  It is very tender and it is served with rice and cheese, fried yuca and cold beer. All meat dishes are usually big servings.
— The rivers are full of fish and piranha is a delicious treat.
— As expected in places near a jungle, the Amazon cuisine includes species that are uncommon in other parts of the world. Those who try it ask for second servings.
